div.bibl: Skandinaven.(Daily Edition), Sept. 4, 1891. AMERICAN BREWING ACADEMY

body.p: Dr. Robert Wahl and Dr. Max Henius have organized the American Brewing Academy. The School will teach practical, analytical, and theoretical brewing methods.
The semester opened with eighteen students, all of whom are Germans. The first semester's work will be in German, but in the future all work will be English.
All the Breweries have free access to the well equipped laboratories, and it is hoped that they will utilize them.
